posts.title: Birth
posts.text: This is the first blog, not automatically generated hello-world.md, set up the hexo blog, 2018 to start writing the article. I am a front-end moron, mix for so many years, technology is nothing better, more and more school decided to write, write technical articles, my main purpose is let yourself deeply these skills. Now the front-end canâ€™t distinguish itself from those of the back ends. The projects that are generated by those automated building tools are applied to many node backends. One of the development directions of the front end is the full-stack, which is also my direction.
